Implemented new key entities and replaced some of the old ones to meet new Central Bank requirements for document management, enabling rollback to the old functionality without data loss.

Mentored a junior developer, assisting with learning new tools and best practices in team development.
Identified and successfully prevented a social engineering attack; introduced two-factor authentication to improve platform security.
